/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a street in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a car driver, as evidenced by the side mirror visible on the left side of the image. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, creating a corridor of urban life. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun casting a bright light that illuminates the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the view. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting with the green of the trees and the various colors of the buildings.
